video.title: Property Brothers
video.synopsis: Contractor Jonathan Scott and real estate expert Drew Scott are identical twins who combine their skills to help families get their dream home.

episodes.synopsis: Kristi and Jay can't agree on anything, whether it's when and where to move, or how much to spend on the needed renovations to their dream home.
episodes.title: Kristi & Jay

episodes.synopsis: Luke and Courtney are desperate to move before their three children outgrow their current home, but their fixer-upper may prove to be too much work.
episodes.title: Luke & Courtney

episodes.synopsis: April is searching for the perfect house downtown, but her micromanaging of the renovation of her dream home tests the brothers' patience and skills.
episodes.title: April

episodes.synopsis: Kristine and Paul struggle to maintain their equilibrium when the renovations on their new house uncover some dangerous and budget-busting problems.
episodes.title: Kristine & Paul

episodes.synopsis: Sarah and Mari are looking for an open-concept home in a family-friendly neighborhood, but unforeseen complications threaten to swamp the deal.
episodes.title: Sarah & Mari

episodes.synopsis: Medical professionals Samira and Shawn need a place close to the office, and the brothers overcome obstacles and buyer anxiety to make it happen.
episodes.title: Samira & Shawn

episodes.synopsis: Angie and Tito's apartment is overflowing with their kid's toys, yet Tito's lavish design ideas may put them over budget on their new fixer-upper.
episodes.title: Angie & Tito

episodes.synopsis: Matt and Krysten are having a lot of arguments over their dream home, from the location and the budget to the furnishings and a few shortcuts.
episodes.title: Matt & Krysten

episodes.synopsis: James and David, desperate to escape their nightmare townhouse, are dreaming of a luxurious home with more space, natural light, and high ceilings.
episodes.title: James & David

episodes.synopsis: The Scott brothers face their biggest challenge ever when they have only two weeks to finish before their prospective buyers leave on their honeymoon.
episodes.title: Parker & Francesca

episodes.synopsis: Caitlin and Steve are hoping for a big, open eco-home, but plumbing problems, budget worries, and construction snafus make them doubt their decisions.
episodes.title: Caitlin & Steve

episodes.synopsis: Because they've been warned against fixer-uppers, nervous newlyweds Kate and Dave are making the renovation process difficult for the brothers.
episodes.title: Kate & Dave

episodes.synopsis: Rose and Giancarlo want to move their daughters out of Rose's parents' basement, but impatient Giancarlo interferes with Jonathan's renovation plans.
episodes.title: Rose & Giancarlo

episodes.synopsis: A couple ready to live under their own roof has little money to spend on their fixer-upper, which poses a problem when their design plan hits a snag.
episodes.title: Under Their Own Roof

episodes.synopsis: Morgan and Kristin decide to stop renting, but their budget means they can only afford a fixer-upper. The brothers help them make it their own.
episodes.title: Dumping the Duplex

episodes.synopsis: Dan and Brittany want to move from a tiny apartment to a home where they can entertain and that can hold the loads of appliances Dan has collected.
episodes.title: Abundance of Appliances

episodes.synopsis: Stan, Leslie and their daughters each have lists of what they want in a home, but they all agree on one thing: They must get out of their condo.
episodes.title: Looking for Wow

episodes.synopsis: Social butterflies Kate and Cole want out of their cramped rental and seek a house with an open floor plan with room for entertaining and their dogs.
episodes.title: Space for a Crowd

episodes.synopsis: Micah and Stephanie both work downtown and want to buy a home nearby. Drew and Jonathan help them find a home they can afford in just the right spot.
episodes.title: Downtown Dream Home

episodes.synopsis: A couple that's been together since high school struggles to picture the drastic transformations that could turn an out-of-date house into a home.
episodes.title: Picturing the Possibilities

episodes.synopsis: A newly single young professional camping out with a friend's family wants to buy a fixer-upper and convert it into a glamorous bachelorette pad.
episodes.title: Bachelorette Pad

episodes.synopsis: After selling their house, Rob, Jessica and their daughter now live with Jessica's parents. They want a high-end home but have a low-end budget.
episodes.title: High-End Home

episodes.synopsis: Olivia longs to escape her cramped studio apartment and buy her first home -- one that matches her eclectic style and has lots of room for guests.
episodes.title: An Eclectic Vision

episodes.synopsis: The lease is about to expire on the small home that Sophie and Preston have been renting, and they stand ready to purchase their first home.
episodes.title: Fit for a Family

episodes.synopsis: When a family outgrows their apartment and buys their first home, the brothers help turn an outdated house into the ultimate family-gathering spot.
episodes.title: Extended Family Fun

episodes.synopsis: A couple sharing a duplex with friends searches for a modern home of their own in the city that will accommodate their active lifestyle.
episodes.title: Active in the City

episodes.synopsis: Ready to start a family, Megan and hockey pro Greg seek help finding the perfect sunny, fun and affordable house in Greg's childhood neighborhood.
episodes.title: Megan and Greg

episodes.synopsis: The brothers help first-time buyers Sandra and Kyle find a property with a modern, open design and easy access to the subway and all amenities.
episodes.title: Sandra and Kyle

episodes.synopsis: Newlyweds Marla and Adam have a few musts for their very first home purchase: a kosher-friendly kitchen, extra bedrooms and a fast commute to work.
episodes.title: Marla and Adam

episodes.synopsis: With their second child on the way, Mark and Priscilla seek help from the brothers to find a big, open-concept house within their budget.
episodes.title: Mark and Priscilla

episodes.synopsis: With their rental lease almost up, Christine, Mathieu and their two kids need to find a roomy but affordable house, with nearby nature trails, fast.
episodes.title: Christine and Mathieu

episodes.synopsis: Expectant parents Kathryn and Eric are ready to leave the city for the suburbs, where they hope to find their family-friendly, fixer-upper dream home.
episodes.title: Kathryn and Eric

episodes.synopsis: Stuck in tiny temporary housing after a stint abroad, Danielle, Chad and their kids need a fully equipped four-bedroom home with a nice backyard.
episodes.title: Danielle and Chad

episodes.synopsis: Joey and handyman Mark team up with the brothers to find and repair a quiet house in the country, with plenty of room for their baby girl.
episodes.title: Joey and Mark

episodes.synopsis: With a baby on the way, gamers Boris and Kari seek a four-bedroom house with a nursery and a fancy kitchen, as well as a high-tech game room.
episodes.title: Kari and Boris

episodes.synopsis: Having moved 12 times in 15 years, Stephan, Karina and their two active kids are ready to settle down in the stylish, modern home of their dreams.
episodes.title: Stephan and Karina

episodes.synopsis: Longtime power couple Nancy and Rhonda are finally moving in together, but need the brothers' help to find a sophisticated yet spacious first home.
episodes.title: Nancy and Rhonda

episodes.synopsis: Eager to escape their cramped townhouse, Crista and Sumit enlist the brothers' help in finding their big, modern but budget-friendly dream home.
episodes.title: Crista and Sumit

episodes.synopsis: New parents Veronica and Andrew are anxious to trade in their cramped condo for their roomier dream house before Veronica's maternity leave ends.
episodes.title: Veronica and Andrew
